translated: Praise of the Perfection of Wisdom
Om, homage to the glorious Perfection of Wisdom
To the one without conceptualization, without support, without fault, without defilement,

original: nityānitye nirvikāre prajñe devi namo'stu te // //
analyzed: nitya anitye nirvikāre prajñe devi namaḥ astu te
translated: To the one who is eternal and non-eternal, without change, O wisdom goddess, homage to you!
O mother of the Buddhas, grandmother of the Bodhisattvas,

original: prapitāmahi sattvānāṃ prajñe devi namo'stu te // //
analyzed: prapitāmahi sattvānām prajñe devi namaḥ astu te
translated: Great-grandmother of beings, O wisdom goddess, homage to you!

analyzed: mātar mātar jaganmātar iti saṃjapatām nṛṇām
translated: To those who chant Mother, mother, mother of the world,

original: manorathaprade śuddhe prajñe devi namo'stu te // //
analyzed: manoratha prade śuddhe prajñe devi namaḥ astu te
translated: To the one who grants wishes, O pure one, O wisdom goddess, homage to you!

original: lakṣmīstvamasi kalyāṇi śrīrdhīḥ śraddhā dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ /
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ tvam asi kalyāṇi śrīḥ dhīḥ śraddhā dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
translated: O auspicious one, you are Lakshmi, Shri, intelligence, faith, fortitude, memory,

original: sarvasvarūpe sarveśi prajñe devi namo'stu te // //
analyzed: sarva svarūpe sarva īśi prajñe devi namaḥ astu te
translated: To the one with all forms, the ruler of all, O wisdom goddess, homage to you!
To the Perfection of Wisdom, which is supramundane and mundane, immeasurable,

original: daśa pāramitākāre prajñe devi namo'stu te // //
analyzed: daśa pāramitā ākāre prajñe devi namaḥ astu te
translated: To the one with the form of the ten perfections, O wisdom goddess, homage to you!
The praise of the glorious Perfection of Wisdom is completed.
